author: lzybkr
body: External tools like less.exe change the console mode.  A shell is responsible for restoring and flags it cares about after running such tools.

comments.author: dahlbyk
comments.body: I believe I'm running into this on https://github.com/dahlbyk/posh-git/pull/304#issuecomment-247516226 in an attempt to resolve https://github.com/Jaykul/PowerLine/issues/1. Repro is pretty simple (`"$([char]27)[32mhello$([char]27)[0m"` is my basic test string).

comments.author: Jaykul
comments.body: I can't seem to repro that in PS 5.1 (5.1.14926.1000) or 6a10 using the less.exe that pscx shipped or git status ... is this fixed?

comments.author: dahlbyk
comments.body: I'm using PS 5.1.14393.103 on Win10 x64, and can reproduce on another machine with the same. I can also reproduce with ConsoleZ; I have not tried conemu.

comments.author: Jaykul
comments.body:
@lzybkr I tried it in ConEmu and out, actually, because at first I thought maybe ConEmu was the reason it worked. Actually, I just retried it in 6a9 and I couldn't repro there, so ... I have no idea. I guess I'm just special.
